sub_title: Supply Chain Seafreight Leader | Sea Logistics Manager, Process Excellence and Systems at Kuehne+Nagel
summary:
My commitment to achieving supply chain excellence drives everything we do. I believe in enhancing our processes, embracing the latest technologies, and nurturing the growth of our incredible team members. 

With extensive international experience in managing End-to-End supply chains, I've proven my ability to deliver outstanding results. One of my strengths is the ability to transfer the passion we ignite within our teams, guiding them towards reaching our goals together. As I move forward, I envision a future where innovation and success walk hand in hand, reshaping the industry and setting new standards of excellence in supply chain management. 

My plan is to be an active part of that.
